cs.IT, cs.COMM, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.NI. 

The paper proposes a scheme for clipping noise cancellation in OFDM and OFDMA systems using compressed sensing. The main focus of the paper is on the application of compressed sensing for noise cancellation, which falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also deals with communication systems (cs.COMM) and signal processing (cs.SI), as it proposes a method for processing signals in OFDM and OFDMA systems. The use of compressed sensing also involves optimization and machine learning techniques, which are covered under the categories of learning (cs.LG) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
